course_title: Special Topics in Sociology: Health Innovation Delivery
class_notes:
(Same as HLTH 485 2)
This course guides students through the process of planning the implementation and evaluation of a health innovation. Human-centered and collaborative innovation models guide development of a sustainable and ethical business plan. (This course is the required capstone for all seniors with a  Health Innovation Concentration graduating in Spring 2022, Summer 2022, or Fall 2022)
course_description: A seminar or lecture series on topics of special sociological concern.
sections: Class Nbr: 3982, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: Hall-Clifford/Wilson, Status: Open
